name: Commande'Os
description:
A game for the Global Game Jam 2018 - Theme: Transmission

In this nice neighborhood, you are the messenger of the village. Get mails from the mailboxes and bring them to their adressee!  beware of the watching stray dogs keeping their part of the street!

Play with gamepad or keyboard, only direction are needed. 

Press Q to exit game (on downloadable version)

Credits: Art and Music:

Laurine Boyer (DeviantArt)

Code:

Michaël BOYER

François CORNET
